Job Description: About this opportunity         SDET in Mobile team will be responsible for testing native Mobile applications (iOS and Android) which will include improvements to existing framework, automating regression scope as well as new features.             In this role, you will            Operate as a part of scrum team and    actively participate in sprint planning, demo and retrospective, attend daily standups      Analyze software functional and non-functional requirements, work closely with manual SQA to understand what needs to be automated     Automated new test cases and maintain existing automated test cases     Monitor regular test execution (new builds and regression), analyze the reports, troubleshoot & investigate the failures     Work with bugs throughout their lifecycle     Generate ideas for framework improvements and implement them            In this role, you ll need             Experience with Mobile testing (Android & iOS) - 5+ years     Experience with Mobile automation (Android & iOS) - 3+ years     Experience with Java and / or Swift     Experience with integration testing, API testing     Experience with Continuous Integration (preferably - Bamboo)     Thorough understanding of the role and the place of QA in SDLC, testing processes and methodologies     Knowledge of Espresso & XCUITest (nice to have)     Knowledge of white box testing (nice to have)     Knowledge about Device Farms ( nice to have)     Experience working in distributed team (nice to have)
